example[0]: Thanks for your hospitality over the past few weeks.
explanation[0]: In everyday English, when thanking someone for their hospitality, you usually say thanks for having me/us:
example[1]: Thanks for having us. We had a great time.
definition[1]: services such as food and drink that an organization provides for guests at a special event
example[2]: the use of a yacht for corporate hospitality
example[3]: There was a reception in the hospitality suite before the game.
